00024 namespace RDK2 { namespace RSensorData {

00026 RJoystickStatus::RJoystickStatus() { }
00027 
00028 RJoystickStatus::RJoystickStatus(const vector<double> &axesData, const vector<bool> &buttonsData)
00029 {
00030     vector<double>::const_iterator axIt;
00031     vector<bool>::const_iterator btIt;
00032     axesNumber = axesData.size();
00033     buttonsNumber = buttonsData.size();
00034     /*axes = new Vector<RDouble>;
00035     buttons = new Vector<RBool>;
00036     for (axIt = axesData.begin(); axIt != axesData.end(); axIt++) {
00037         axes->push_back(new RDouble(*axIt));
00038     }
00039     for (btIt = buttonsData.begin(); btIt != buttonsData.end();
00040             btIt++) {
00041         buttons->push_back(new RBool(*btIt));
00042     }*/
00043     axes = axesData;
00044     buttons = buttonsData;
00045 }

00047 RJoystickStatus::~RJoystickStatus()
00048 {
00049     /*if (axes) axes->clear();

00054 
00055 double RJoystickStatus::getAxis(unsigned int axis) const throw (string)
00056 {
00057     double retval;
00058     if (axis <= axesNumber) {
00059         //retval = (*axes)[axis]->value;    // ((double)(*axes)[axis]->value / maxAxisValue);
00060         retval = axes[axis];
00061     } else {
00062         ostringstream oss;
00063         oss << "Invalid axis number: " << axis;
00064         throw oss.str();
00065     }
00066     return retval;
00067 }
00068 
00069 bool RJoystickStatus::getButton(unsigned int button) const throw (string)
00070 {
00071     bool retval;
00072     if (button <= buttonsNumber) {
00073         //retval = (*buttons)[button]->value;
00074         retval = buttons[button];
00075     } else {
00076         ostringstream oss;
00077         oss << "Invalid button number: " << button;
00078         throw oss.str();
00079     }
00080     return retval;
00081 }
00082 
00083 void RJoystickStatus::read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException)
00084 {
00085     r->startReading(getClassName());
00086     axesNumber = r->read_i8();
00087     buttonsNumber = r->read_i8();
00088     //axes = (Vector<RDouble> *)r->readObject();
00089     //buttons = (Vector<RBool> *)r->readObject();
00090     r->doneReading();
00091 }
00092 
00093 void RJoystickStatus::write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException)
00094 {
00095     w->startWriting(getClassName());
00096     w->write_i8(axesNumber);
00097     w->write_i8(buttonsNumber);
00098     //w->writeObject(false, axes);
00099     //w->writeObject(false, buttons);
00100     w->doneWriting();
00101 }
00102 
00103 string RJoystickStatus::getStringForVisualization() const
00104 {
00105     ostringstream oss;
00106     unsigned int i;
00107     oss << "Axes: (";
00108     for (i = 0; i < axesNumber; i++) {
00109         //oss << (*axes)[i]->value << ", ";
00110         oss << axes[i] << ",";
00111     }
00112     oss << ")  Buttons: (";
00113     for (i = 0; i < buttonsNumber; i++) {
00114         //oss << (*buttons)[i]->value << ", ";
00115         oss << buttons[i] << ",";
00116     }
00117     oss << ")";
00118     return oss.str();
00119 }
